card_text: 1 monster with 2500 or more ATK + 1 face-down Defense Position monster with 2500 or less DEF$NYou can only Special Summon "Ace★Spades Speculation(s)" once per turn. You can Tribute 1 Attack Position monster and 1 face-down Defense Position monster; Special Summon this card from your GY. This card gains the following effect based on its battle position.$N●Attack Position: Gains ATK equal to the highest original ATK among monsters your opponent controls (your choice, if tied).$N●Defense Position: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.
